entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
